namjoon.quote: Life is a sculpture that you cast as you make mistakes and learn from them.

seokjin.quote: You worked hard. Keep trying your best.

yoongi.quote: Those who don’t have a dream, it’s okay, it’s okay if you don’t have a dream. You just have to be happy.

hoseok.quote: Don't ever make decisions based on fear. Make decisions based on hope and possibility

jimin.quote: Remember there is a person here in Korea, in the city of Seoul, who understands you.

taehyung.quote: Don’t be trapped in someone else’s dream.

jungkook.quote: Without anger or sadness, you won’t be able to feel true happiness.
